## Documentation Checklist

- [ ] Accurate and up-to-date
- [ ] Clear and concise
- [ ] Includes code examples (if applicable)
- [ ] Links work and are relevant
- [ ] Follows existing documentation style
- [ ] No typos or grammar issues
- [ ] Includes diagrams/screenshots (if helpful)

## Priority

- [ ] 游댮 Critical - Blocks onboarding or major workflows
- [ ] 游 High - Important for developers/users
- [ ] 游리 Medium - Helpful improvement
- [ ] 游릭 Low - Minor clarification

## Effort

- [ ] 游릭 Small (< 30 minutes) - Minor correction
- [ ] 游리 Medium (30-60 minutes) - Section update
- [ ] 游 Large (1-2 hours) - New documentation
- [ ] 游댮 Extra Large (> 2 hours) - Comprehensive guide
